title: @Riot new slash updates question?
body:
Before I say anything I just want to say that I love the fact that you are doing up all the old splash arts, and not just classic ones but skins too! I think visuals are very important and that this is a great thing! :D

However my question is about how you select the splash arts to update.
I question the judgment of choosing for example jade dragon wuking  for updating over a skin that is really outdated for example phantom Karthus,
While the new jade dragon wuking is really cool, tbh the skin did not need a new splash. There was nothing wrong with the old one, the model hadnt changed and the painting was of a higher standard than a lot of other skins. Where as phantom karthus has had an extreme mode change, (and now looks absolutely nothing like the splash art) and as well as that, the painting quality is not up to the same standard as the rest of the game. 
Of course the argument could be made that it is a legacy and so doesn't make you much profit and so it isn't worth updating (similar to not changing the magnificent twisted fate to reflect its price category) however grim reaper and statue of karthus both also have very very crudely painted splash arts, so why jade dragon over one of them?

TL:DR: why pick a skin that doesn't need it like jade dragon wuking over a skin that desperately needs it phantom/grim reaper/statue of karthus?
I'm sure there is a reason, I would just like to know what it is, or how the selection process works. :)

Thanks

replies.body:
"Our splash art team is ramping up to the long-term task of updating our older/less faithful skin splashes. We’re working out a consistent plan when it comes to releasing updates for some of our older champions (Nidalee splashes where?) but, for now, you can enjoy the slick new look of the 5 skins below!"

This was in our patch notes today. Our skins team has plans to give more context at a later date

Ahh ok thanks :)

i love how they are re-doing the arts as a big thing!

Our artist are pretty talented! I remember being super excited when the new Ezreal splash art happened. Can't wait till we get more new splash art...Soon™
